name: Sumit Negi
summary: Results-oriented and passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in both frontend and backend technologies.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed a scalable e-commerce platform with a user-friendly interface, integrated payment gateways, and order management.

responsibilities: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Implemented new features and enhancements in the existing applications.
Performed code reviews and mentored junior developers.
Assisted in the development of a real-time chat application.
Gained hands-on experience with various frontend and backend technologies.
